text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this!? 
Trainer has made a……mistake!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, no, there's a saying that says
you'll succeed one day if you just try!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I've hit telephone poles while thinking
about Bakushin quite a few times
before…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes, even the gurus fail! Once
again, let this be a lesson to you…!
